Html:
Is ther e away to detect when the tab changes?

Also is there a way to programatically change the tabs?

Meanign if there are 2 tabs and you are currently on tab1, is there a way to prgrammatically toto tab2?

Unfortunately, no.
There is no way to detect tab changes nor a programatic way to change the current tab.

Note that this limitation is in the Windows Ribbon Framework, and not in the wrapper library.
